15.commit_message: Bug 1333038 - Use 'modern' pointers to fix crash due to nsMsgLineStreamBuffer object being deleted while still in use. r=mkmelin a=jorgk Suspected "use after free" in nsMsgLineStreamBuffer::ReadNextLine() leading to crash since object may be destroyed while still in use on another thread.
